title: Test
yAxis: Brand value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Brand value in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Brand value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2014, and lastly roughly constant from 2014 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Max Brand value in billion U.S. dollars about 1.2 was recorded at Year 2012
Min Brand value in billion U.S. dollars about 0.8 was recorded at Year 2016, and 2017
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2012 to 2016.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely constant which exists from 2016 to 2017.
